text: The Slovak Volleyball Federation (, SVF), is the governing body for Volleyball in Slovakia since 1993. ==History== The Slovak Federation has been recognised by FIVB from 1993 and is a member of Confédération Européenne de Volleyball. == Presidents == {| class="wikitable" width=35% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !President !!From !!To |- | align=left|Dušan Mešár || 1993 || 2000 |- | align=left|Ivan Majerčák || 2000 || 2004 |- | align=left|Miroslav Kováčik || 2004 || 2005 |- | align=left|Ľubor Halanda || 2005 || 2017 |- | align=left|Martin Kraščenič || 2017|| reigning |} ==See also== *Slovakia men's national volleyball team *Slovakia women's national volleyball team ==References== == External links == * Category:Volleyball in Slovakia Slovakia Volleyball
title: Slovak Volleyball Federation
